alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 3:05AM MST until December 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches, locally higher in the Ogden Valley. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on area routes through the morning hours. Snow will transition to more showery this morning, with periodic winter driving conditions into Tuesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
